title: Will the new client have more sound sliders?
body:
There need to be more sound sliders then there currently are. If you haven't checked the settings before, there are two "music" and "sfx". Music only controls music (as far as I know and is fine) where as "SFX" covers ALL sounds effects. 

The SFX one really grinds my gears. If I want to hear the sweet sounds of the pick and ban phase I have to opt into the little blips and swooshes of LFG and a deafening THWACK every time I click any tab. Sure, I can close LFG and never use any features of the client (currently I just mute SFX) but I'd prefer a little more customisability.

replies.body: This would be great in game also, allow the pings to be loud as fuck, but some non needed sounds to be muted. Or does that already happen? I haven't checked the settings in years.
The in game sliders are pretty great since everything is separate.
